name: Preparing for Rain
description:
As a cat, you are preparing for the upcoming rainy seasons. Get your friends to help you out -- but be careful! As a cat who becomes bored very easily, if you idle about too much, it'll be game over for you! 

A very short game made in a 6-hour game dash, the theme was spooky.

ALT + ENTER to fullscreen

Controls: UP**, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT

UP: Jump

DOWN: Jump off your platform

LEFT + RIGHT: Walk left and right!

**If you walk off a platform, you can jump mid-air once! This can be used to your advantage.
